member.name: M:Laga.GeneticAlgorithm.Selection`1.RouletteWheel(Laga.GeneticAlgorithm.Population{`0},System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Performs a roulette wheel selection over a population. Chromosomes with higher fitness have a proportionally higher chance of selection.
member.param: The popolution to perform roulette wheel selection on
>Maximum number of chromosomes to select for the mating pool
If true, uses normalized fitness probabilities for selection

member.name: M:Laga.GeneticAlgorithm.Selection`1.TournamentSelection(Laga.GeneticAlgorithm.Population{`0},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs a tournament selection, where a subset of chromosomes compete, and the chromosome with the highest fitness in the subset is selected.
member.param: The population to perform tournament selection on
The number of chromosomes in each tournament, sometimes called pressure
The number of chromosomes to select for the mating pool
member.returns: A new population representing the mating pool
